## Developing Data Product - Car Evaluator

This product is using Shiny to develop a Car Evaluator basesd on data set of Car Evaluation Dataprovided by Machine Learning Repository from UCI (http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Car+Evaluation) to develop a model to evaluate the car value. This project contains two part:

1. The summary presentation of the apps: https://rpubs.com/Alex147/127029
2. The shiny apps of Car Evaluator: https://alexanderlou.shinyapps.io/Car_Class

The source code is avaiable in the github
